history.narrative: Law 12-113, the “Felony Murder Amendment Act of 1997,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-139, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 22, 1997, and October 7, 1997, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 17, 1997, it was assigned Act No. 12-176 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-113 became effective on May 16, 1998.
